text: Kitab (, kitāb), also transcribed kitaab, is the word for "book" in Arabic, Swahili, Urdu, Hindi and various Indian and Turkic languages. * Kitaab, a 1977 Hindi language movie * Kithaab (also written Kitab), a 2018 Malayalam language play (or drama) * Kitab, the Russian name for Kitob, a city in Uzbekistan == Related pages == * K-T-B, a Semitic word triconsonantal root * Khitab, a town in northwestern Syria * Kitab-Verlag, a publishing house in Klagenfurt, Austria * Mus'haf, or kitāb *
title: Kitab
